answers.answer: Please post your thyroid related test results and reference ranges shown on the lab report.  What, if any, other symptoms do you have?  Are you taking any thyroid meds?  If so, what type and daily dosage?

question: Hello , I am 70 years old , I suffer from High Blood Pressure, Diabetes Osteropetrois . A few years ago i had my thyroxid Gland removed because it was overactive. Ever since i have not been given any thyroid medications and have been suffering from bittle bones and have a tendency to fall . I am curious as to why my doctor didnt feel the need to prescibe my thyroxine.. Also i have Osterposis which makes it hard to do daily tasks - My doctor has recieved several otifications to send me to an Osteropath but he refuses to send me . Please help
title: Doctor will not give me Thyroxine even though i had one of my gland removed
